name: name
description: Description: The value of the hashtag after the # sign.

name: url
description: Description: A link to the hashtag on the instance.

name: history
description: Description: Usage statistics for given days (typically the past week).

name: history[][day]
description: Description: UNIX timestamp on midnight of the given day.

name: history[][uses]
description: Description: The counted usage of the tag within that day.

name: history[][accounts]
description: Description: The total of accounts using the tag within that day.

name: following OPTIONAL
description: Description: Whether the current tokenâ€™s authorized user is following this tag.
